name: Rancher Shotgun Shooter Sim
description:
Your farm is under attack! Some jealous goons from neighboring farms are trying to steal your harvest and capture your farm! You have to fight them off, whatever it takes! Your farm is full of surprises – you don’t have ordinary guns, but you have vegetables! Pepper six-shooter, carrot sniper rifle, and many other useful vegetables will help you defend your land from intruders!

Rancher Shotgun Shooter Sim features:
• Unusual veggie weapons
• Simple and convenient controls
• Relaxing and funny farmland atmosphere
• Angry farmers to fight against

Stop wasting your time watching the grass grow! Download Rancher Shotgun Shooter Sim game and prove that the farm is yours!
